img_above_text:
Once you have finally defeated Non-Able, you'll be able to obtain the Non-Able Spirit, which has a pretty intense effect for raising your stats while lowering your mana.
Non-Able
img_below_text:
There's not much else to loot around the large stone pagoda where you fought Non-Able, so now is a good time to head back to the Forest of Felicity Shrine, and make your way through the canyon where the Frog Guai boss was to enter the next optional area.
## Towers of Karma

img_summary: The image depicts a snowy canyon environment with a player character engaged in combat or exploration, wielding a glowing weapon and surrounded by visual effects. This scene likely follows the defeat of the Non-Able boss, as mentioned in the preceding text, and serves as a transition area before heading back to the Forest of Felicity Shrine or progressing toward the next optional area, the Towers of Karma.
